defaultSku.displayName: F&F Regular Fit Suit Trousers 36 Waist 35 Leg Charcoal

parentProduct.longDescription: Bring some classic tailoring into your wardrobe with these charcoal suit trousers, which can be paired with the matching jacket to make a suit. Cut to a regular fit for comfortable all-day wear, these trousers have belt loops, two slanted front pockets, and two back pockets with button fastenings.Zip fly with hook and bar fasteningsThese regular fit trousers have a wider leg shape for a classic, comfortable silhouette. Model height is 6 feet 2 inches
